channel.title: Yes on Poco A Poco | Web Design and Development
channel.description: Recent content in Yes on Poco A Poco | Web Design and Development

item.title: Website for The Xavier Lab
item.description: The Xavier Lab at Massachusetts General Hospital and the Broad Institute needed to refresh their web presence. They had the content, their problem was its presentation. Their website was information rich, but ugly and difficult to keep updated.

item.title: Website for the GodTech Project
item.description: The GodTech project endeavours to research, consider, and popularize the ways that bioscience and digital technology may practically impact us.
